overview: Experience Montreal legend Tony Koulakis and his 11-seat greasy-spoon, Cosmos, famous for cholesterol-loaded breakfasts since 1967. Filmmaker and loyal customer Ezra Soiferman takes a loving glimpse at Tony's one-of-a-kind eatery and its devoted patrons. Follow "The God of the Potatoes" as he nervously places his beloved Cosmos in the trust of his children and returns to the mythical sun-drenched Greek island where he was born, for his first vacation in 32 years. Will Tony retire in Crete or return to Canada to keep clogging our arteries?
title: Man of Grease
